page.title: 19RELIGION/CREDENHILL
page.content: {BURGHILL: }ST MARY THE VIRGIN NORMAN WORK & 14th CENTURY STAINED GLASS. 134 ADULTS ON ELECTORAL ROLL.{BRINSOP:}ST GEORGE:HEREFORDSHIRE. SCHOOL OF NORMAN SCULPTERS-TYMPANIUM OF ST GEORGE. {CREDENHILL:}NORMAN WORK 14th CENTUARY. GLASS THOMAS TRAHERNE MONUMENT CREDENHILL R.A.F CAMP HAS CofE , R.C & CHURCH OF SCOTLAND CHURCHES.ROMAN CATHOLICS WORSHIP AT CREDENHILL OR WEOBLEY.{METHODISTS:}TILLINGTON CHAPEL THE VICAR OF BURGHILL WRITES:"MOST OF THE VILLAGE POPULATION WOULD STILL REGARD THEMSELVES AS CofE ALTHOUGH ONLY A MINORITY WORSHIP WEEKLY AT THEIR PARISH CHURCH. MANY CAME TO THE CHURCH TO BE MARRIED & EXERCISE THEIR LEGAL RIGHT AS PARISHONERS, IRRESPECTIVE OF CREED TO BE BURIED IN THE CHURCHYARD A FACT RECOGNISED BY AN ANNUAL GRANT FROM THE PARISH COUNCIL (Â£300 THIS YEAR) TOWARDS ITS UPKEEP.
